title: Check your answers
des: Check your answers before submitting your claim.
checkAllAnswers: Check all the answers you’ve provided and details you have entered are correct.
warning: This is your last opportunity to change any details before you submit your claim.
remember: Remember, if you’re not sure about anything, you can save and return to your claim at any time by selecting ‘Save as draft’ at the bottom of this page.
emailConfirmation: We’ll send you an email confirmation once you’ve submitted your claim.
printLinkTxt: Print this page for your records

personalDetails.genderSameAsBirth: Gender same as registered birth sex
personalDetails.howToBeContacted: How would you like to be contacted?
personalDetails.takePartInHearing: Would you be able to take part in hearings by video pr phone
personalDetails.disability: Do you have a physical, mental or learning disability or health condition that means you need support during your case?
personalDetails.title: Preferred title

employmentDetails.didYouWorkFor: Did you work for the organisation or person you're making your claim against?
employmentDetails.isStillWorking: Are you still working for the organisation or person you're making your claim against?
employmentDetails.noticePeriod: Do you have a written contract with notice period?
employmentDetails.noticeLength: Is your notice period in weeks or months?
employmentDetails.payBeforeTax: Pay before tax and National Insurance
employmentDetails.payAfterTax: Pay after tax and National Insurance
employmentDetails.payPeriod: Is this your weekly, monthly or annual pay?
employmentDetails.pensionScheme: Did the respondent make any contributions to your pension?
employmentDetails.benefits: Do you or did you receive any employee benefits?
employmentDetails.newJob: Have you got a new job?
employmentDetails.newPayBeforeTax: New job pay before tax and National Insurance

respondentDetails.workedAtRespondent: Did you work at the respondent's address?
respondentDetails.addressWorkedAt: The address you work or worked at
respondentDetails.acasNumber: Do you have an Acas certificate number?
respondentDetails.noAcasReason: Why do you not have an Acas Number?
respondentDetails.name: Name

claimDetails.claimType: What type of discrimination/pay claim are you making?
claimDetails.ifClaimSuccessful: What do you want if your claim is successful
claimDetails.expectedTribunalsRecommendation: What tribunal recommendation would you like to make?
claimDetails.forwardClaim: Do you want us to forward your whistleblowing claim to a relevant regulation or body?
